title: Chapter 1: The Mandalorian
description: A Mandalorian bounty hunter tracks a target for a well-paying client.

title: Chapter 2: The Child
description: Target in-hand, The Mandalorian must now contend with scavengers.

title: Chapter 3: The Sin
description: The battered Mandalorian returns to his client for reward.

title: Chapter 4: Sanctuary
description: The Mandalorian teams up with an ex-soldier to protect a village from raiders.

title: Chapter 5: The Gunslinger
description: The Mandalorian helps a rookie bounty hunter who is in over his head.

title: Chapter 6: The Prisoner
description: The Mandalorian is part of a crew of mercinaries springing a convict from a prison ship.

title: Chapter 7: The Reckoning
description: An old rival extends an invitation for The Mandalorian to make peace.

title: Chapter 8: Redemption
description: The Mandalorian comes face-to-face with an unexpected enemy.

title: Chapter 9: The Marshal
description: The Mandalorian is drawn to the Outer Rim in search of others of his kind.

title: Chapter 10: The Passenger
description: The Mandalorian must ferry a passenger with precious cargo on a risky journey.

title: Chapter 11: The Heiress
description: The Mandalorian braves high seas and meets unexpected allies.

title: Chapter 12: The Siege
description: The Mandalorian rejoins old allies for a new mission.

title: Chapter 13: The Jedi
description: The Mandalorian journeys to a world ruled by a cruel magistrate who has made a powerful enemy.

title: Chapter 14: The Tragedy
description: The Mandalorian and Child travel to an ancient site.

title: Chapter 15: The Believer
description: To move against the Empire, the Mandalorian needs the help of an old enemy.

title: Chapter 16: The Rescue
description: The Mandalorian and his allies attempt a daring rescue.

title: Chapter 17: The Apostate
description: The Mandalorian begins an important journey.

title: Chapter 18: The Mines of Mandalore
description: The Mandalorian and Grogu explore the ruins of a destroyed planet.

title: Chapter 19: The Convert
description: On Coruscant, former Imperials find amnesty in the New Republic.

title: Chapter 20: The Foundling
description: Din Djarin returns to the hidden Mandalorian covert.

title: Chapter 21: The Pirate
description: The people of Nevarro need protection from rampant pirate attacks.

title: Chapter 22: Guns for Hire
description: The Mandalorian visits an opulent world.

title: Chapter 23: The Spies
description: Survivors come out of hiding.

title: Chapter 24: The Return
description: The Mandalorian and his allies confront their enemies.
